tool.name: SAGA.shapes_points.12
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/openapi.py isArraySHAPES False output_data $output_data name SAGA.shapes_points.12 SHAPES $SHAPES POLYPOINTS $POLYPOINTS POLYGONCVX $POLYGONCVX response $response outputType1_HULLS $OutputSection_1.outputType1_HULLS transmissionMode_1 $OutputSection_1.transmissionMode_1 outputType2_BOXES $OutputSection_2.outputType2_BOXES transmissionMode_2 $OutputSection_2.transmissionMode_2

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Points
param.help: PointsThe following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: POLYPOINTS
param.label: Hull Construction
param.help: This option does not apply to simple point layers.

param.name: POLYGONCVX
param.label: Polygon Convexity
param.help: Describes a polygon's compactness as ratio of its area to its hull's area.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_1
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_2
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Implementation of 'Andrew's Monotone Chain Algorithm' for convex hull construction.
